message.content:
cs.SC, cs.NA, cs.SY, cs.DS, cs.CG

Reasoning: 
- cs.SC (Symbolic Computation) is the most likely category as the paper deals with hybrid symbolic-numeric methods to compute the exact "rational univariate representation" of a component of the input system from approximate roots.
- cs.NA (Numerical Analysis) is also likely as the paper uses numerical methods such as Newton iterations to increase the accuracy of the RUR.
- cs.SY (Systems and Control) is a possible category as the paper deals with polynomial systems and their roots.
- cs.DS (Dynamical Systems) is another possible category as the paper deals with finding roots of polynomial systems, which can be viewed as fixed points of a dynamical system.
- cs.CG (Computational Geometry) is a less likely category, but still possible as the paper deals with certifying that a given point is near an exact root, which can be viewed as a geometric problem.
